text:
SALEM

District Administration: Public grievances redress meeting, V. Sampath, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Periyar University: Department of Energy Studies, workshop on solar photovoltaic based power generation technologies, V. Krishnakumar, Head, Department of Physics of the University, inaugurates, Ramchander Nirudi, Senior Assistant Professor, Department of Electricals and Electronics Engineering, Padmasri Dr. B. V. Raju Institute of Technology, Vishnupur, Narsapur, Telengana, delivers key-note address, C. Swaminathan, Vice-Chancellor, presides, 10.30 a.m.

Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, ISTE sponsored national level workshop on ‘PCB design and manufacturing techniques’, K. Kumaravel, MD and proprietor, Hi Teck Technologies, Salem resource person, 10 a.m.

Knowledge Institute of Technology (KIOT): Department of Civil Engineering, inauguration of Centre for Sustainable Research, P. Gopalakrishnan, Director and Head, Asia Pacific and Middle East USGBC and R. Gowrisankar, Manager-Ecuation, USGBC, Chennai, chief guests, P. S. S. Srinivasan, principal, presides, 2 p.m.

Vivekanandha Arts and Science College for Women, Sankagiri: Cultural Day, C. Paul Princely Rajkumar, RDO, chief guest, M. Karunanithi, chairman, presides, 10 a.m.

Tamil Nadu Iyal Isai Nataka Manram and Department of Art and Culture: Ramayanam Festival titled 'Varna Kalanjiyam', Revathi Muthusamy troupe from Srirangam presents ‘Ramayanam’ dance drama, Vijaragavachariar hall, Cherry road, 6.30 p.m.

New Century Book House Limited: Book exhibition, Bose maidan, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Income Tax Department – Namakkal Range: Get together and interaction session, M. Tirumala Kumar, Principal Commissioner of Income Tax, chief guest, N. Sukumar, Joint Commissioner of IT, Namakal Range and others speak, Nala Hotel, 4.30 p.m.

District Administration: Public grievances redress meeting,

V. Dakshinamoorthy, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Mahendra Engineering College: Department of Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering, workshop on ‘Lab view: graphical system design in engineering applications’, Rajasekaran, Trainer, Lab View Academy, Bengaluru, resource person, M. G. Bharathkumar, Chairman, presides, 10 a.m.

RASIPURAM

Muthayammal Polytechnic College: Annual Day, R. Sundaram, Founder and Chief Executive, Aerospace Engineers, The Salem Aeropark, Mallur, chief guest, 2 p.m.
title: engagements
